alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 1:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lafayette, Taylor, Madison and south central Lowndes Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 114 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Monticello to 20 miles west of Steinhatchee. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Madison, Perry, Lake Park, Lee, Pinland, Jug Island, Ebb, Buckville, Eridu, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs, Sirmans and Shady Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
